entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 09:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
